headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self' https://genticai.gumroad.com
